name: 1. SM overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play S map & M map at this difficulty. It takes effect at 200% difficulty. The experience of computer heroes is 3 times & the weekly production of town creatures is 1.5 times.

chinese.name: 1. SM overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩S图和M图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄3倍经验，城镇生物1.5倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
